hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Map of the Bottom of the Well# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Blue Fire Arrows# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Prelude of Light#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Left Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fish Bottle#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fish Bottle#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.
